categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Rox Durmak was a male holo forger who lived during the Galactic Civil War. Sometime between the Battle of Yavin and the Battle of Hoth, Durmak helped the Alliance to Restore the Republic trick the Galactic Empire to keep the Imperials away from Echo Base on Hoth. He later hid on Tatooine, where he was pursued by several bounty hunters before fleeing the desert planet.
